participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and fun-loving, Emily enjoys hanging out with her friends and exploring new experiences.
participant_1.background: I am 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. I just want to have fun with my friends. I do not drink or do drugs or anything. I work; I have a part-time job at Burger King.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Reserved and contemplative, Jake often finds solace in social media and reflects on his life choices.
participant_2.background: I spend most of my time on Facebook when I'm not working. I work at a nursing home. I do not believe in God. I'm overweight and unhappy.

content.text: That sounds good. i work at a pizza place so i am a burger now
